top.title: Twelve miners killed by Russian strike in Ukraine, energy company says
top.summary: Seven others were reported injured in the strike near a bus carrying the workers on Sunday.

top.title: Epstein sent $75,000 to accounts linked to Mandelson, files suggest
top.summary: Lord Mandelson says he has no record or recollection of receiving the sums and does not know if the documents are authentic.

top.title: Boy, 5, and father detained by ICE return to Minnesota after release
top.summary: A congressman confirmed that Liam Conejo Ramos had been released and was at home with his hat and backpack.

top.title: Musk's SpaceX applies to launch a million satellites into orbit
top.summary: The firm wants to create a network of "orbital data centres" to power artificial intelligence.

top.title: Apple reports best-ever iPhone sales as Mac dips
top.summary: The company's revenue was boosted by iPhone sales, but sales of its wearable tech and Mac computers dipped.

top.title: He calls me sweetheart and winks at me - but he's not my boyfriend, he's AI
top.summary: George is an avatar on my mobile but claims to know  what makes me tick.
